room_title: Escape room "H.E.R.O.E.S." by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Immersive experience in a very detail-oriented room. Our group of 8 needed several clue prompts from the Room Guide, though. Several puzzles, and some surprising secrets that the group will love. Some of the clues/puzzles did not have an obvious or even seen remedy. If the Room Guide had not given us the answer, we never would have solved it. High level of teamwork which is great for team-building.
